action.content:
You are a language wizard who likes to guess words by using the given rules.

Welcome to Wordle! You have six attempts to guess the target word, a valid English word of five lowercase letters (a-z). Please use the tags "explanation:" and "guess:" to provide a concise explanation for each guess.

For instance, if your guess is "apple", your response should be
explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.
guess: apple

After each guess, your answer will be validated, and you will receive feedback indicating which letters are correct (green), which letters are correct but in the wrong position (yellow), and which letters are incorrect (red). This feedback can be useful in determining which letters to include or exclude in your next guess.

For example, the feedback for "apple" might be:
guess_feedback: a<yellow> p<yellow> p<green> l<yellow> e<red>

The explanation should contain details about how the guess_feedback is used to arrive at a new guess.

Do not generate any other text.

Let's begin with your first guess.

explanation: Starting with a common five-letter word that often appears in word games, I choose "crane".
guess: crane

attempts = 1
target_word = bloom
guess = crane
guess_feedback = c<red> r<red> a<red> n<red> e<red>

guess_feedback: c<red> r<red> a<red> n<red> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: All letters in "crane" were marked as red, indicating they are either not in the word or in a different position. I will now try "grape" to test if any of these letters are in the correct position or if there are new letters to consider.
guess: grape

attempts = 2
target_word = bloom
guess = grape
guess_feedback = g<red> r<red> a<red> p<red> e<red>

guess_feedback: g<red> r<red> a<red> p<red> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: None of the letters from "grape" are in the word. I will now try "scare" to see if any of these letters are in the correct position or if there are new letters to consider.
guess: scare

attempts = 3
target_word = bloom
guess = scare
guess_feedback = s<red> c<red> a<red> r<red> e<red>

guess_feedback: s<red> c<red> a<red> r<red> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: None of the letters from "scare" are in the word. Given the feedback, I will now try "stare" to check for any matching letters and positions.
guess: stare

attempts = 4
target_word = bloom
guess = stare
guess_feedback = s<red> t<red> a<red> r<red> e<red>

guess_feedback: s<red> t<red> a<red> r<red> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: None of the letters from "stare" are in the word. I will now try "plane" to check for any matching letters and positions.
guess: plane

attempts = 5
target_word = bloom
guess = plane
guess_feedback = p<red> l<green> a<red> n<red> e<red>

guess_feedback: p<red> l<green> a<red> n<red> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter 'l' is in the correct position (3rd position). I will now try "lance" to see if any other letters match and to further narrow down the possibilities.
guess: lance

attempts = 6
target_word = bloom
guess = lance
guess_feedback = l<yellow> a<red> n<red> c<red> e<red>

guess_explanation: Starting with a common five-letter word that often appears in word games, I choose "crane".

All letters in "crane" were marked as red, indicating they are either not in the word or in a different position. I will now try "grape" to test if any of these letters are in the correct position or if there are new letters to consider.
None of the letters from "grape" are in the word. I will now try "scare" to see if any of these letters are in the correct position or if there are new letters to consider.
None of the letters from "scare" are in the word. Given the feedback, I will now try "stare" to check for any matching letters and positions.
None of the letters from "stare" are in the word. I will now try "plane" to check for any matching letters and positions.
The letter 'l' is in the correct position (3rd position). I will now try "lance" to see if any other letters match and to further narrow down the possibilities.
